title: Did the Muslim groups keep the money for the victims of the shooting at Senajog in Pittsburgh?
subtitle: The facts surrounding the transfer of $238,634 from funds raised by two Muslim charities have been starkly distorted by protected websites.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Most of the $238,634 raised to victims of mass shootings in October 2018 was retained by Islamic organizations or mosque at the Church of the Tree of Life in Pittsburgh.
